talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff>... You really did block the entrance well,
right? I don't need to worry about it?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>We barricaded the door from <clr:0000>the inside<clr:ffff>
so that the monsters couldn't get in...

But you're out until your back heals,
<clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff>, and there's no way I can move
something so heavy all by myself...
GreetingBefore00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomSavsaaba>Sav'saaba.<sp:5:0:0> Elsewhere it might be sav'otta
or sav'aaq, but here it's always sav'saaba.
talk0024:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Notice_01>It's not like we got that many customers to begin
with, so maybe it's not really a big deal that the
<clr:0000>door can't be used<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What? No, no, no. You know I can't lift
that myself!

Wh-what are we going to do? Customers
<clr:0000>won't be able to get in<clr:ffff> if we can't unblock
the door!
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Angry>What was that, Perda? What did you
just say?!
GreetingBefore04: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Don't worry. All of our items are for voe.
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Even when I'm inside, I can still get a
sense of the time of day from how lively
it sounds... <sp:5:0:0>Hmm, it must be...<sp:5:0:0>evening.
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You know this isn't where you drop off
garbage, right? <sp:5:0:0>I'm not gonna just take
any worthless thing you want to get rid of.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Seriously, come back when you've grown
up enough to realize you need to take
that off before you can sell it to me.
talk0010: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Feel free to relax a bit before you leave.
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There are monsters lurking outside
though, so it's best not to linger in
the doorway.
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It looks like you've cleared away our
little barricade.

I suppose that's for the best. You got past
it in the first place, so it couldn't have
been doing that much good.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>With the town so quiet right now, even I
was beginning to feel a bit lonely.

I normally enjoy alone time, but having
someone nearby lately has brought a little
peace of mind.
I wasn't sure for a while if I wanted to
hire <clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff>, but now I feel like I couldn't
get by without her.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><sp:0:2:2:5000>Hey, <clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff>... You made sure the entrance was really
securely blocked, right?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Yep! It is very much completely blocked
with a crate!
talk0017:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseS_00>K-keep it down! What do you think's gonna happen
if those monsters outside hear us?!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Great idea... Let's see what you've got.
Com_Talk_05c:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>It's easier to get away from the guards if
you're carrying less, right? I'll buy more
from you.
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It sounds like the monsters are all gone
now, <clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff>.

So...<sp:5:0:0>could you move that crate away
from the door?
Com_Talk_05d: <sp:3:0:2:0000>I'm so bored... Let me see what you have.
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh, of course! <sp:5:0:0>Sorry, let me move it now...


Easy as— Ack!
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's getting lively outside. It must be early
morning now...
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When the sand shroud was still around,
the town was so quiet that even I was
beginning to feel a little lonely.
I normally enjoy alone time, but having
someone nearby lately has brought a little
peace of mind.
I wasn't sure for a while if I wanted to
hire <clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff>, but now I feel like I couldn't
get by without her.
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's getting pretty noisy outside, huh?
That must mean it's the morning—<sp:5:0:0>no,
wait—<sp:5:0:0>the afternoon.
Com_Talk_02b:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Wow, this is actually some pretty nice
stuff. Sarqso.
talk0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You say goodbye, but it's dangerous
outside, so we've blocked the door. <sp:5:0:0>It's
for our own safety.
I don't know how you managed to find
your way in here...

But unless you can somehow magically
pass through solid objects, it's going to
be a bit more difficult to leave.
Com_Talk_02c:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Sarqso. This should help me fend off
the boredom for a while, at least...
Com_Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I've been here long enough that my stock
is just...boring. I could stand to see some
interesting items.
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>So this is the kind of stuff you can find
in the outside world, huh...
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>A-a voe...<sp:5:1:0> But the door is blocked...<sp:5:1:0>
How did you...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Never mind. It's our rule not to pry into
the business of our customers.

You're welcome in our shop, no matter
how you managed to make it inside.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is the <clr:0000>Gerudo Secret Club<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> the only
shop in town that sells clothing designed
with voe in mind.
Considering voe aren't allowed in town,
I'm sure you can understand why the
shop is a secret.
Anyway, that's how we run our business.
We're not concerned with who you are.

As an outcast myself, I appreciate
your business.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>You can't hold any more, right?
Fortunately for both of us, you can just
sell me something to make room.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>I suppose I could. But I won't be paying
more than any other trader would.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When I hear your footsteps, I'll unlock
the door for you.

Please don't hesitate to make use of it in
the future.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is the <clr:0000>Gerudo Secret Club<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> a secret
place that sells clothing designed with
voe in mind.
We make it a rule not to pry into our
customers' business.

But that rule goes both ways. Please
don't ask anything more about this shop.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't hear any of the children, so it must
be nighttime now...
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease><clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff> used to be a place filled
with the voices of merchants and children.

It's eerie for it to be so quiet...
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Sarqso. I'll be sure to restock with some
more good stuff.
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Sarqso.


Everything we sell is of the finest quality,
so I'm sure you'll be satisfied.
